SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT PP_NO , PP_NAME , TAG_NO , B_NAME , PP_PRICE , PP_LOCATION , PP_OPTION , PP_INFO , TO_CHAR(PP_DATE, 'RRRR"년"MM"월"DD"일"') "PP_DATE" , PD_NO , COST , FLOOR , PYEONG , ROOMS , TO_CHAR(MOVE_DATE, 'RRRR"년"MM"월"DD"일"') "MOVE_DATE" , PP_IMG_NO , ORIGIN_NAME , CHANGE_NAME , FILEPATH FROM PROPERTY P JOIN PROPERTY_DETAIL PD USING(PP_NO) JOIN PP_IMG I USING(PP_NO) JOIN BROKERAGE B USING(B_NO) WHERE P.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY PP_NO DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT P.PP_NO , PP_NAME , TAG_NAME , PP_PRICE , PP_LOCATION , PP_COUNT , DECODE(PP_OPTION,NULL,'없음',PP_OPTION) AS "PP_OPTION" , DECODE(PP_INFO,NULL,'없음',PP_INFO) AS "PP_INFO" , FILEPATH || CHANGE_NAME AS "FILEPATH" FROM PROPERTY P JOIN TAG USING (TAG_NO) JOIN PP_IMG I ON (P.PP_NO = I.PP_NO) WHERE P.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY PP_COUNT DESC
SELECT B.B_NO , B_NAME , B_TYPE , DECODE(B_BR_BEST,NULL,' ',B_BR_BEST) AS "B_BR_BEST" , FILEPATH || CHANGE_NAME AS "FILEPATH" FROM BROKERAGE B JOIN B_IMG I ON (B.B_NO=I.B_NO) WHERE B.STATUS ='Y'
